body:
Comment 6 by **marko.kocic**: 
Re Comment 5
Take a look at https://github.com/markokocic/Go-SDL/tree/windows
I just added CFLAGS and LDFLAGS to msys folders where libs are usually compiled. Didn't
build mixer thougs, since I couldn't build sdl-mixer itself on my box, so I had to
comment all references to that in test program in order to compile it.
